json.text: This IELTS Speaking question is about clothes. What kinds of clothes do you
Personally, I prefer smart casual clothing. I'm not a huge fan of very
formal attire, I only own one suit, a couple of neckties, and and one pair of
dress shoes. So most of my clothing in my wardrobe consists of buttoned up
t-shirts, long-sleeve shirts, jeans, trainers, and things like that. I like
clothes that are very versatile and clothes and outfits I can wear for lots
of different occasions - whether I'm doing something slightly professional like
teaching, or I'm just hanging out with my friends. So I like things that are just
comfortable, easy to wash, and and are fairly casual. Want more? Check out
MarkTeacher.com for more IELTS courses lessons and tips!
